newsitem.title: SENEGAL: Canada gives Senegal $23 mln aid for energy, women.
newsitem.headline: Canada gives Senegal $23 mln aid for energy, women.

text.p: Canada has given Senegal 14 billion CFA francs ($23 million) for projects in the energy sector and to improve the status of women in society, Senegalese officials said.
The bulk of the money, 12.4 billion CFA francs, will go to the OMVS, an organisation based in Dakar grouping Senegal, Mali and Mauritania, which operates energy projects based on the River Senegal.
